content.name: feature
content.description: Information about features on the storage system.    @engdocs  New concept introduced by the feature F1295 System Configuration, Licensing  and Upgrades. Updated with concepts introduced by F4569: Black Content   Stream Integration & Enablement.

attributes.name: reason
attributes.description: Reason for the feature to be in a state other than enabled. If state is enabled, reason is not applicable.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the feature instance.

attributes.name: license
attributes.description: License that enables the feature, as defined by the license resource type.  An empty value indicates that the feature is not license-based.
